edu.rice.starvote

Interface IMotor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PrinterMotor

    public interface IMotor

    Interface for a bidirectional variable speed motor controller. This controls the main printer motor on reference hardware.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void forward()
      Move motor forward at full speed.
      void forward(double speed)
      Move motor forward at a specified speed.
      void forwardSlow()
      Move motor forward at slow speed.
      void reverse()
      Move motor reverse at full speed.
      void reverse(double speed)
      Move motor reverse at a specified speed.
      void reverseSlow()
      Move motor reverse at slow speed.
      void stop()
      Stop the motor.

    • Method Detail

      • stop

        void stop()

        Stop the motor.

      • forward

        void forward()

        Move motor forward at full speed.

      • forwardSlow

        void forwardSlow()

        Move motor forward at slow speed. The exact speed is undefined but should be less than half full. For precise speed control, use the method forward(double speed).

      • forward

        void forward(double speed)

        Move motor forward at a specified speed.

        Parameters:
        speed - Value in range [0.0, 100.0].

      • reverse

        void reverse()

        Move motor reverse at full speed.

      • reverseSlow

        void reverseSlow()

        Move motor reverse at slow speed. The exact speed is undefined but should be less than half full. For Precise speed control, use the method reverse(double speed).

      • reverse

        void reverse(double speed)

        Move motor reverse at a specified speed.

        Parameters:
        speed - Value in range [0.0, 100.0].
